channel.title: Char .Dat Shards
channel.description: i have never used a shards but would like to learn a bit from one and i cant open it i use notepad ++ and notepad normal and none work but i get like random shit please help

item.title: Char .Dat Shards
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

They’re probably encrypted/written in a different format - if you want to see the file structure just look at how it’s written and perhaps prevent the encryption process/write them in plain text (ie using BufferedWriter to write and BufferedReader to read plain text).

Read full topic
